kubejs.ponder.tag.lava_dip.description: Drop things in lava and they come out... different?
kubejs.ponder.tag.falling.description: Blocks falling onto other blocks causes transformations as well!
kubejs.ponder.blaze_spawn.text_1: The wild blaze only spawns on quartz block.
kubejs.ponder.enderman_spawn.text_1: The wild enderman only spawns on soul sand.
kubejs.ponder.ghast_spawn.text_1: The wild ghast only spawns on gravel.
kubejs.ponder.growing_endoflame.text_1: bury the petals around the table
kubejs.ponder.growing_endoflame.text_2: endoflame will be planted on top of the table
kubejs.ponder.growing_sugar_cane.text_1: put a twisting vine in the flower pot
kubejs.ponder.growing_sugar_cane.text_3: The weeping vines will get replaced by sugar cane
kubejs.ponder.hoglin_spawn.text_1: The wild hoglin only spawns on crimson nylium.
kubejs.ponder.magma_cube_spawn.text_1: The wild magma cube only spawns on magma block.
kubejs.ponder.music_disc_pigstep.text_3: pigstep disc inserted into the jukebox
kubejs.ponder.piglin_spawn.text_1: The wild piglin only spawns on netherrack.
kubejs.ponder.wither_skeleton_spawn.head: wither_skeleton spawning
kubejs.ponder.wither_skeleton_spawn.text: The wild wither skeleton only spawns on nether bricks.
kubejs.ponder.zombified_piglin_spawn.tex: The wild zombified piglin only spawns on crimson hyphae.
